summary: High school graduate with seven years of hands-on experience as a Library Aide in diverse office settings. Demonstrates excellent communication, customer service, and multi-tasking skills; proficient in Microsoft Office; capable of working independently with limited supervision and adapting to changing conditions. Fluent in English with strong writing and oral skills.
skills: work well independently with limited supervision
ability to prioritize and remain focused

experience.title: Library Aide (Full-time)
experience.description: Assisted customers at the circulation desk; checked out, renewed, and checked-in materials; issued and updated library cards and customer accounts; processed cash transactions for fines and fees; printed bus passes; resolved issues to maximize circulation efficiency; renewed materials; answered questions about accounts over the phone; discharged and sorted returned materials; packed/unpacked deliveries of books and AV items; shelved items in the 700-759.99 section; searched for claimed items; created and managed an Excel document to track out-of-system items; routed out-of-system books to proper locations; participated in the spirit committee.

experience.title: Voting System Technician (VST)
experience.description: Set up the ADA iVotronic unit and DS200 optical scanner; opened, troubleshot, and closed equipment on Election Day; instructed voters on ballot insertion; assisted visually impaired voters with ballot insertion and audio ballots; prepared materials and returned them to the regional site.

experience.title: Public Service Intern
experience.description: Performed administrative and office support for multiple supervisors; answered telephone calls, greeted visitors, word processing, and filing; conducted Internet research; assisted with archiving county records; helped with payroll preparation; created and maintained tables/spreadsheets to track maintenance activities; supported staff in reception and document processing.

experience.title: Culinary Arts
experience.description: Skillfully prepared meals; knife skills; nutrition; food safety and sanitation; baking principles; cooking methods; food service purchasing; restaurant operations; execution of basic food preparation; presentation and proper seasoning.

experience.title: Hair Stylist
experience.description: Maintained knowledge of the hair care industry and business operations; goal setting; quick thinking; creativity; active listening; coordination; demonstrated tolerance and adaptability.

experience.title: Women of Tomorrow (W.O.T) Mentor Group
experience.description: Mentor and scholarship program for young women; assessed situations; ensured tasks completed on time; interpreted rules; demonstrated integrity; instilled self-confidence and self-esteem; encouraged flexibility and commitment to learning.
